Title: Provides confidentiality for communications arising out of law enforcement peer support counseling
Summary: Provides confidentiality for communications arising out of law enforcement peer support counseling.
LawCode: Amd ยง837-z, Exec L (as proposed in S.6244-A & A.6721-A)
